reviewText: If, like myself, you are intrigued by true crime stories you cannot help but find this interesting. Watching recreations is generally much more engaging than just reading the facts.

I like watching the ID channel so now I have the shows on DVD  thank you
Would recommend this dvd
Great DVD to add to my collection and I have the first one so I will get all of them.
True stories of how twisted some people are and what lengths they would go to to carry out their crimes.

I chose this because i prefer True crime stories to fiction. I enjoy mainly British series such as "Waking the Dead" and "Silent Witness" both well written and characterised by the actors. I would say to anyone who enjoy True Crime this is a msut buy.
Is series is exactly what it states it is.  Some I remember from the past but it still held my attention.  Only down fall is when I am watching I am glued to the T.V.

I enjoyed all of the episodes in this true crime series.  I would have liked them better if they had not included narration by the dead victims; such content is speculative hearsay that was added for entertainment purposes only, if murder and death can be considered entertainment.  However, all episodes were presented in a professional format, and contained the relevant facts about each case.  I would recommend the series to any amateur sleuth who enjoys an interesting mystery.
True crimes takes one to a new level of investigation. Interesting to see how they build a case out of next to nothing for evidence.
